definition: not capable of being obtained, belongs to lowest social and ritual class in India
details:
adjective
- not capable of being obtained
= synonyms: inaccessible
- ( especially used in traditional Hindu belief of the lowest caste or castes) defiling
- forbidden to the touch
= example: forbidden to the touch
- impossible to assail
= synonyms: unassailable
- beyond the reach of criticism or attack or impeachment
= example: beyond the reach of criticism or attack or impeachment
noun
- belongs to lowest social and ritual class in India
